report.title: Simple list of occurrences with abundance
report.description: A list of occurrences designed for list output.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND (o.website_id in (#website_ids#) OR o.created_by_id=1 OR o.blocked_sharing_tasks IS NULL OR NOT o.blocked_sharing_tasks @> ARRAY['R'::character ]) AND (o.sample_id=#sample_id# or o.parent_sample_id=#sample_id#) AND (#allow_confidential# = 1 OR (o.confidential = false AND o.hide_sample_as_private = false)) AND (#allow_unreleased# = 1 OR o.release_status = 'R') AND o.zero_abundance=false

column.name: count
column.sql: array_to_string(ARRAY[ sum(case when onf.attr_sex_stage_count ~ '^\d+$' then onf.attr_sex_stage_count::integer else null end)::text, string_agg(case when onf.attr_sex_stage_count !~ '^\d+$' then onf.attr_sex_stage_count else null end, ' + ') ], ' + ')
